newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Yeltsin meets Chernomyrdin in Barvikha sanatorium.
newsitem.headline: Yeltsin meets Chernomyrdin in Barvikha sanatorium.

text.p: Russian President Boris Yeltsin met Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin on Tuesday and the two men discussed a broad range of economic, social and international issues, Interfax news agency said.
Yeltsin's press office confirmed that the two had met, but it had no details of the discussions.
Yeltsin, 65, is in the Barvikha sanatorium outside Moscow while doctors prepare him for an operation on his heart.
On Monday he asked Chernomyrdin, administration chief Anatoly Chubais and the heads of both houses of the Russian parliament to coordinate their work closely while he gets ready for the operation.

Interfax said on Tuesday that Yeltsin and Chernomyrdin had discussed budget problems, relations between various branches of power and ways to finance the army in a meeting which lasted for about an hour.
